item.title: How can smart people argue for a tax cut?
item.description: We need to get our fiscal house in order, not make matters worse

item.title: When AI reasoning goes wrong: Microsoft Research shows more tokens can mean more problems
item.description: Not all AI scaling strategies are equal. Longer reasoning chains are not sign of higher intelligence. More compute isn't always the answer.

item.title: Hertz’s stock was flat this year. Now billionaire Bill Ackman is driving it higher.
item.description: Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital buys $46 million in Hertz’s stock, which is rallying 17%.
